content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
Runs the current search and returns summary information about paginated results.

Calling this method does not give you the result set or save the search.

To retrieve data, use PagedData.fetch(options).

content.value:
Las relaciones siempre se crean desde el record hijo. En el registro padre no se hace nada.



Si agregamos un campo de tipo list/record transaction en mi reg personalizado por ej, historial de pedimentos; Eso es lo que crea la relacion. Ahi mismo en el edit page del campo viene la opcion de en que subtab mostrar en el registro padre

Las subtab se crean, 
si es un record nativo desde customization -> Forms -> Subtabs
si no es un record nativo entonces se crean dentro de la pagina de la estructura del record

content.value:
Customer deposit: Pago en adelantado/Saldo a favor para ser usado en futuras ordenes
Sales order: Promesa de entregar bienes a un precio y en una fecha establecida 
Cash Sale: Pago recibido al entregar los bienes
Invoice: Factura pendiente de pago al no haber recibido pago al entregar los bienes
Customer payment: Pago recibido del cliente para ser aplicado a alguna factura

snippets.name: Diferencias entre movimientos contables o de venta

content.value:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN"> <#elseif .locale == "zh_TW"> <#elseif .locale == "ja_JP"> <#elseif .locale == "ko_KR"> <#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
<#if companyInformation.logoUrl?length !=0> ${companyInformation.companyName}
${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}		 ${record@title}
#${record.tranid}
${record.trandate}
of
${record.billaddress@label} ${record.shipaddress@label} ${record.total@label?upper_case}
${record.billaddress} ${record.shipaddress} ${record.total}
${record.duedate@label}: ${record.duedate}
${record.terms@label} ${record.duedate@label} ${record.otherrefnum@label} ${record.salesrep@label} ${record.shipmethod@label} ${record.partner@label}
${record.terms} ${record.duedate} ${record.otherrefnum} ${record.salesrep} ${record.shipmethod} ${record.partner}
<#if record.item?has_content> <#assign jsonBase={}> <#assign newList=[]> <#list record.item as item> <#assign currentDescription1=item.custcol_tek_pia_ukne_desc1> <#assign currentDescription2=item.custcol_tek_pia_ukne_desc2> <#assign currentDescription3=item.custcol_tek_pia_ukne_desc3> <#assign currentProduct=item.custcol_tek_pia_ukne_nameproduct> <#assign currentLocation=item.custcol_tek_pia_ukne_location> <#assign currentItem=item.item> <#assign currentKey= currentProduct+''+currentLocation> <#if jsonBase?has_content> <#assign "conteos" = 0> <#list jsonBase?keys as key> <#if key==currentKey> <#assign "conteos" = 1> <#assign "itemrate"=item.rate> <#assign "itemtotal"=jsonBase[key].total+item.amount> <#assign "itemqty"=jsonBase[key].quantity+item.quantity> <#assign "jsonBase" = jsonBase+{currentKey : {"item": currentItem, "location":currentLocation, "quantity": itemqty, "product": currentProduct, "description1": currentDescription1, "description2": currentDescription2, "description3": currentDescription3, "rate": itemrate, "total":itemtotal}}> <#if conteos==0> <#assign "itemrate"=item.rate> <#assign "itemtotal"=item.amount> <#assign "itemqty"=item.quantity> <#assign "jsonBase" = jsonBase+{currentKey : {"item": currentItem, "location":currentLocation, "quantity": itemqty, "product": currentProduct, "description1": currentDescription1, "description2": currentDescription2, "description3": currentDescription3, "rate": itemrate, "total":itemtotal}}> <#else> <#assign "itemrate"=item.rate> <#assign "itemtotal"=item.amount> <#assign "itemqty"=item.quantity> <#assign "jsonBase" = jsonBase+{currentKey : {"item": currentItem, "location":currentLocation, "quantity": itemqty, "product": currentProduct, "description1": currentDescription1, "description2": currentDescription2, "description3": currentDescription3, "rate": itemrate, "total":itemtotal}}>
<#list jsonBase as ke, val> <#assign "newList" = newList+[val]> <#list newList as item><#if item_index==0>
Item Location Product Quantity Description Rate Amount
${item.item} ${item.location} ${item.product} ${item.quantity} ${item.description1}
${item.description2}
${item.description3}
 $${item.rate?string('0.####')} ${item.total?string.currency}
  ${record.subtotal@label} ${record.subtotal}
  ${record.taxtotal@label} (${record.taxrate}%) ${record.taxtotal}
  ${record.total@label} ${record.total}

content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
N/Search is probably the best option

N/Query does allow multi level joins though, the field ids may not be the same as the ones described in the Records Browser.
The correct ids are the ones that appear in the help text of the workbook analytic fields
